name: ibm_cloud_app_management_agent
label: ibm_cloud_app_management_agent
description: Data structure describing the IBM Cloud App Management agent to be deployed on a host

attributes.name: icam_agent_location
attributes.description: Source for the IBM Cloud App Management Agent installer, eg http://IP_ADDRESS:8888/APP_MGMT_Agent_Install_2018.2.0
attributes.label: Agent source location

attributes.name: icam_agent_location_credentials
attributes.description: redentials required to retrieve the IBM Cloud App Management agent, provided in a user:password format
attributes.label: Agent source location credentials

attributes.name: icam_agent_source_subdir
attributes.description: Subdirectory within the installer where the installation files reside, eg APP_MGMT_Agent_Install_2018.2.0
attributes.label: Agent subdirectory

attributes.name: icam_agent_installation_dir
attributes.description: IBM Cloud App Management installation directory
attributes.label: Agent installation directory

attributes.name: icam_agent_name
attributes.description: IBM Cloud App Management agent to be installed. For example, os.
attributes.label: Agent name
